form.p: Creates a project for defining a content targeting rule. The name of the project must be a Bundle Symbolic Name (e.g. rule.example). The last segment of this name has special meaning for the chosen project template:
form.li:
rule.* — Create an content targeting rule project with some stub code that demonstrates the key features of a content targeting rule. (e.g.)
Content Targeting API
Rule.java
Language.properties — for the language properties.
ct_fields.ftl — for the freemarker template.
rule.*.test — Create a content targeting rule test project, which will create necessary files for using arquillian for integration tests.
